name: Global Lane
overview:
Global Lane is an innovative start up founded in 2009 by two co-founders in Finland and working towards solving one of the most pressing issues of modern times : huge paper clutters in our wallets! Managing and keeping a record of paper receipts can be clumsy and time consuming. Every day, tens of millions of consumers are faced with the trouble of dealing with paper receipts and managing them. Our fundamental question is why do we need paper receipts? How can we care for the environment by reducing the amount of paper used in receipts?

We are a passionate team of entrepreneurs who care for environment and would like to help our customers in giving them an innovative smart solution called “e-receipts”The company has evolved to become one of the pioneers of the ‘paperless’ world and is a digital receipts solutions company. We provide smart electronic receipts solutions to help our customers â€“ from consumers and small businesses to the largest global organizations â€“ to procure, manage and store their receipts in digital format. Managing and keeping a record of paper receipts can be clumsy and time consuming. In order to make it easier for the customer, we plan to introduce digital or paperless receipts.
